TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SiteMapDataSource extends System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceControl implements class System.ComponentModel.IListSource, class System.Web.UI.IDataSource
Public Class SiteMapDataSource Inherits HierarchicalDataSourceControl Implements IDataSource, IListSource
public ref class SiteMapDataSource : System::Web::UI::HierarchicalDataSourceControl, System::ComponentModel::IListSource, System::Web::UI::IDataSource
type SiteMapDataSource = class inherit HierarchicalDataSourceControl interface IDataSource interface IListSource

summary.span: 提供一个数据源控件，Web 服务器控件和其他控件可将其用于绑定到分层站点地图数据。

span.span: Provides a data source control that Web server controls and other controls can use to bind to hierarchical site map data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [指定起始节点Specifying the Starting Node](#specifying_the_starting_node) - [检索站点地图数据Retrieving Site Map Data](#retrieving_site_map_data) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是由为站点配置的站点地图提供程序存储的站点地图数据的数据源。The control is a data source to the site map data that is stored by the site map providers that are configured for your site. 使不是专门的站点导航控件(如、 和控件) 的 Web 服务器控件可以绑定到分层站点地图数据。 The enables Web server controls that are not specifically site navigation controls, such as the , , and controls, to bind to hierarchical site map data. 您可以使用这些 Web 服务器控件以目录形式显示网站地图, 或在站点中主动导航。You can use these Web server controls to display a site map as a table of contents or to actively navigate a site. 或者, 您可以使用控件, 该控件专门用作站点导航控件, 因此不需要该控件的实例。Alternatively, you can use the control, which is designed specifically as a site navigation control and therefore does not need an instance of the control. ## 指定起始节点Specifying the Starting Node 绑定到站点地图数据, 并基于站点地图层次结构中指定的起始节点显示其视图。The binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy. 默认情况下, 它是层次结构的根节点, 但也可以是层次结构中的任何节点。By default, it is the root node of the hierarchy but it can also be any node within the hierarchy. 起始节点由多个属性的值进行标识, 如下所示:The starting node is identified by the values of several properties as follows: |正在启动节点Starting Node|属性值Property Values| |-------------------|---------------------| |层次结构的根节点 (默认设置)。The root node of the hierarchy (the default setting).| 为 `false`。The is `false`.

未设置 。The is not set.| |表示当前正在查看的页的节点。The node that represents the currently viewed page.| 为 `true`。The is `true`.

未设置 。The is not set.| |层次结构的特定节点。A specific node of the hierarchy.| 为 `false`。The is `false`.

已设置。The is set.| 如果将属性设置为0以外的值, 则它会影响开始节点以及控件公开的站点地图数据层次结构。 If the property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the control. 的负数或正整数值标识由和属性标识的起始节点中的站点图层次结构中的级别数 (由和属性标识), 以偏移子树的起始节点由数据源控件公开。The negative or positive integer value of the identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the and properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control. 如果将属性设置为负数 *-n*, 则由数据源控件公开的子树的开始节点是所标识的起始节点上方的祖先节点 n 层次结构级别。 If the property is set to a negative number *-n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node. 如果值*n*大于层次结构树中的祖先级别数, 则该子树的起始节点是站点地图层次结构的根节点。If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy. 如果将属性设置为正数 + n, 则公开的子树的起始节点是标识的起始节点下的子节点 n 级别。 If the property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node. 由于层次结构中可能存在子节点的多个分支, 因此在可能的情况下, 将尝试直接在标识的起始节点与表示当前请求页的节点之间的路径上解析子节点。Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible. 如果表示当前请求页的节点不在标识的起始节点的子树中, 则忽略该属性的值。If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the property is ignored. 如果表示当前请求页的节点小于标识的起始节点下的*n*级, 则当前请求的页节点将用作开始节点。If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node. ## 检索站点地图数据Retrieving Site Map Data 站点地图数据是从对象 ( 例如 ASP.NET 的默认站点地图提供程序) 检索的。Site map data is retrieved from an object, such as , which is the default site map provider for ASP.NET. 您可以指定为您的站点配置的任何提供程序, 以便向提供站点地图数据 , 并可通过访问集合获取可用提供程序的列表。You can specify any provider that is configured for your site to provide the site map data to the and can obtain the list of available providers by accessing the collection. 与所有数据源控件一样, 的每个实例都与单个 helper 对象 (称为 "数据源视图") 相关联。Like all data source controls, every instance of a is associated with a single helper object, known as a data source view. 是基于数据源的属性的站点地图数据的视图, 可通过调用方法来检索。 The is a view on the site map data, according to the properties of the data source, and is retrieved by calling the method. 维护控件绑定到的对象。 The maintains the object that the controls bind to. 默认情况下, 起始节点是层次结构的根节点, 但你可以将起始节点设置为任意节点。By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node. 起点可以是相对于站点地图中当前位置的节点, 也可以是绝对位置。The starting point can be a node that is relative to the current position in the site map or to an absolute position. 可以通过设置属性来指定起始节点。You can specify the starting node by setting the property. 专用于导航数据, 不支持常见的数据源操作, 如排序、筛选、分页、缓存或数据记录操作, 例如更新、插入或删除。The is specialized for navigation data, and does not support common data source operations such as sorting, filtering, paging, caching, or data record operations such as updates, insertions or deletions. ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 使用控件以声明方式将控件绑定到站点地图。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to a site map using a control. 从根节点级别开始检索站点地图数据。The site map data is retrieved beginning at the root node level. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1/CS/webform1smdscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_1/VB/webform1smdsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 检索可用作数据列表的源的数据源控件的列表。

span.span: Retrieves a list of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中所包含的数据源控件可用作数据列表的源。

span.span: An of data source controls that can be used as sources of lists of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法检索可用作控件的源的一组对象。 Use the method to retrieve a set of objects that can be used as sources for the control. 站点地图数据源控件将其数据列表封装为对象。Site map data source controls encapsulate their lists of data as objects. 因此, 当与一个或多个对象关联时 , 控件表示一个列表源对象, 该方法返回一个包含一个元素 (数据源控件本身) 的列表。Therefore, when associated with one or more objects, a control represents a list source object and the method returns a list containing one element - the data source control itself. 方法调用静态方法来检索可用作数据源的对象的列表。 The method calls the static method to retrieve a list of objects that can be used as sources of data. 检查方法是否返回有效的视图名称集合。The checks whether the method returns a valid collection of view names. 如果是, 则返回一个包含一个元素的列表。If it does, the returns a list containing one element - the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `viewName`参数是视图的根节点的 URL, 而不是数据源视图的名称, 因为它与其他支持命名视图的数据源控件的名称相同。The `viewName` parameter is the URL for the root node of the view, not the name of the data source view as it is with other data source controls that support named views.

summary.span: 获取或设置与数据源控件关联的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a object that is associated with the data source control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定要与数据源控件一起使用的站点地图提供程序实例。Use the property to specify the site map provider instance to use with the data source control. 如果已设置, 则实例可能不同于属性标识的访问接口。The instance can be different than the provider that is identified by the property, if set.

summary.span: 获取或设置数据源绑定到的站点地图提供程序的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the site map provider that the data source binds to.

value.span: 绑定到的站点地图提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the site map provider that the binds to.

value.span: 默认情况下，该值为 ，并且使用该站点的默认站点地图提供程序。

span.span: By default, the value is , and the default site map provider for the site is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式将控件绑定到由默认提供程序之外的对象提供的站点地图数据。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively bind a control to site map data that is provided by an object other than the default provider. Web.config 文件使自定义对象可`SiteMapDataSource`用于控件:The Web.config file makes a custom object available to the `SiteMapDataSource` control: ``` ``` 在类概述中`SimpleTextSiteMapProvider`可以找到此 web.config 文件示例引用的类的代码。The code for the `SimpleTextSiteMapProvider` class that this Web.config file example references can be found in the class overview. 如果使用 Visual Basic 示例, 则命名空间以 "VB" 而不是 "CS" 结尾。If you use the Visual Basic example, the namespace ends in "VB" instead of "CS". 你还可以在类概述中查找 ".txt" 站点地图文件的示例内容。You can also find sample content for the "text.txt" site map file in the class overview. > [!NOTE] > 不是站点的默认提供程序, 该提供程序 (在本例中) 仍为对象。 `AsciiTextProvider`The `AsciiTextProvider` is not the default provider for the site, which (in this case) remains the object. 将 控件的属性设置为自定义站点地图提供程序的名称, 并绑定到相应的站点地图数据。The property of the control is set to the name of a custom site map provider, and the binds to the corresponding site map data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3/CS/webform3smdscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_3/VB/webform3smdsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示站点地图节点树是否使用表示当前页的节点进行检索。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the site map node tree is retrieved using the node that represents the current page.

value.span: 如果节点树是相对于当前页检索的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the node tree is retrieved relative to the current page; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对的调用过程中将计算 属性,并使用方法来帮助确定要用作生成节点树的起点的站点地图节点。The property is evaluated during calls to the and the methods to help determine which site map node to use as a starting point to build the node tree. `false` 和属性互相排斥 -如果设置属性, 请确保属性为。 The and properties are mutually exclusive - if you set the property, ensure that the property is `false`. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个从起始节点开始计算的正整数或负整数偏移量，该起始节点确定了由数据源控件公开的根层次结构。

span.span: Gets or sets a positive or negative integer offset from the starting node that determines the root hierarchy that is exposed by the data source control.

value.span: 默认值为 0，它指示由 公开的根层次结构与起始节点相同。

span.span: The default is 0, which indicates that the root hierarchy exposed by the is the same as the starting node.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果将属性设置为0以外的值, 则它会影响开始节点以及控件公开的站点地图数据层次结构。 If the property is set to a value other than 0, it affects the starting node and with it the site map data hierarchy that is exposed by the control. 的负数或正整数值标识由和属性标识的起始节点中的站点图层次结构中的级别数 (由和属性标识), 以偏移子树的起始节点由数据源控件公开。The negative or positive integer value of the identifies the number of levels up or down the site map hierarchy from the starting node that is identified by the and properties to offset the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by data source control. 如果标识的起始节点是表示当前请求页的节点, 则将忽略。If the identified starting node is the node that represents the currently requested page, the is ignored. 如果将属性设置为负数-n, 则由数据源控件公开的子树的开始节点是所标识的起始节点上方的祖先节点 n 层次结构级别。 If the property is set to a negative number -*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed by the data source control is the ancestor node *n* hierarchical levels above the identified starting node. 如果值*n*大于层次结构树中的祖先级别数, 则该子树的起始节点是站点地图层次结构的根节点。If the value *n* is greater than the number of ancestor levels in the hierarchical tree, the starting node of the subtree is the root node of the site map hierarchy. 如果将属性设置为正数 + n, 则公开的子树的起始节点是标识的起始节点下的子节点 n 级别。 If the property is set to a positive number +*n*, the starting node of the subtree that is exposed is a child node *n* levels below the identified starting node. 由于层次结构中可能存在子节点的多个分支, 因此在可能的情况下, 将尝试直接在标识的起始节点与表示当前请求页的节点之间的路径上解析子节点。Because more than one branch of child nodes might exist in the hierarchy, the attempts to resolve a child node directly on the path between the identified starting node and the node that represents the currently requested page, if possible. 如果表示当前请求页的节点不在标识的起始节点的子树中, 则忽略该属性的值。If the node that represents the currently requested page is not in the subtree of the identified starting node, the value of the property is ignored. 如果表示当前请求页的节点小于标识的起始节点下的*n*级, 则当前请求的页节点将用作开始节点。If the node that represents the currently requested page is less than *n* levels below the identified starting node, the currently requested page node is used as the starting node. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了和属性的效果。The following code example demonstrates the effect of the and properties. 该示例包含多个 ASP.NET 页、一个母版页、一个母版页部分和一个 web.sitemap 文件。The example consists of several ASP.NET pages, a master page, master page section, and a Web.sitemap file. Web.sitemap 文件定义站点的层次结构。The Web.sitemap file defines the hierarchical structure of the site. 对于此代码示例, 它定义由唯一的 Url (如 1 .aspx、2 .aspx、.aspx 和 .aspx) 标识的多个页面, 如下所示:For this code example, it defines a number of pages identified by unique URLs, such as 1.aspx, 2.aspx, A.aspx, and B.aspx, as follows: 网站母版页包含 控件内的和控件。The Site.master page contains the and a controls inside a control. 它使用属性将公开的层次结构的起始节点标识为 default.aspx。It identifies the starting node of the exposed hierarchy as Default.aspx, using the property. 仅 default.aspx 页面使用该站点. master 文件。The Site.master file is used by the Default.aspx page only. 所有其他页 (如 1 .aspx、2 .aspx、.aspx 等) 都使用 "母版页母版页" 部分。All other pages, such as 1.aspx, 2.aspx, A.aspx, and so on, use the Section.master master page. 此母版页非常类似于 Site master, 但它包含几个可试验的控件。This master page is very similar to Site.master, however it contains several controls that you can experiment with. 显示站点地图数据的控件最初绑定到`SiteMapDataSource1`, 后者指定为 1。The control that displays site map data is initially bound to `SiteMapDataSource1`, which specifies a of 1. 这表示显示当前请求页的父节点。This indicates that the parent node of the currently requested page is displayed. 如果你查看第一页, 则由显示的层次结构是 A、1、2。If you view page 1.aspx, the hierarchy displayed by the is A, 1, 2. 但是, 如果你查看页 4 .aspx, 则层次结构为 B、3、4。However, if you view page 4.aspx, the hierarchy is B, 3, 4. 如果将的更改 为`SiteMapDataSource2` ,则控件以不同的方式显示站点地图数据。If you change the for the to `SiteMapDataSource2`, the control displays site map data differently. 使用`SiteMapDataSource2`时`true`, 属性设置为, 这意味着站点地图数据相对于当前请求的页显示, 并且属性设置为-1, 指示子节点的一级显示 (如果可能)。When you use `SiteMapDataSource2`, the property is set to `true`, which means that the site map data is displayed relative to the currently requested page and the property is set to -1, indicating that one level of child nodes is displayed, when possible. 查看 .aspx 页时, 显示的层次结构是当前级别的层次结构, 包括所有同级, 如 B 和 C。查看 1 .aspx 时, 将不再显示父节点。When you view the A.aspx page, the hierarchy that is displayed is the hierarchy of the current level, including all siblings, such as B and C. When you view 1.aspx, the parent nodes are no longer displayed. 下面的代码示例演示了可与此代码示例的其他组件一起使用的 ASP.NET 页面之一。The following code example demonstrates one of the ASP.NET pages you can use with the other components of this code example. ``` <%@ Page MasterPageFile="~/Section.master" Title="Untitled Page" %>

1.aspx

 ```

summary.span: 获取或设置站点地图中的一个节点，数据源然后使用该节点作为从分层的站点地图中检索节点的参照点。

span.span: Gets or sets a node in the site map that the data source then uses as a reference point to retrieve nodes from a hierarchical site map.

value.span: 站点地图中的节点的 URL。

span.span: The URL of a node in the site map.

value.span: 从站点地图中检索标识的 及其任何子节点。

span.span: The retrieves the identified and any child nodes from the site map.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性绑定到站点地图数据, 并基于站点地图层次结构中指定的起始节点显示其视图。The property binds to site map data and presents its view based on a specified starting node in the site map hierarchy. 默认情况下, 起始节点是层次结构的根节点, 但你可以将起始节点设置为具有属性的任何节点, 或将属性设置为`true`。By default, the starting node is the root node of the hierarchy, but you can set the starting node to any node with the property or set the property to `true`. 属性的值存储在视图状态中。The value of the property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式设置属性并将控件绑定到控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property and bind a control to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6/CS/webform2smdsnocustomcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource_decl_6/VB/webform2smdsnocustomvb.aspx#1)]
